newsitem.title: UK: CRICKET-WAUGH OFF FIELD WITH STOMACH PAINS.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-WAUGH OFF FIELD WITH STOMACH PAINS.

text.p: Australian batsman Mark Waugh failed to take the field at the start of the third day of the first test on Saturday because of stomach pains.
Waugh, who batted at number four in the first innings, had been taken to see a specialist, a spokesman for the English Cricket Board said.
With Jason Gillespie still having treatment for a hamstring injury, Australia had two substitutes in the field, Justin Langer and Ricky Ponting.
They announced earlier that pace bowler Paul Reiffel had been summoned to join the tour from Australia.
